com.st.BlueSTSDK

Class NodeEmulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.BlueSTSDK.Node
      • com.st.BlueSTSDK.NodeEmulator

  • public class NodeEmulator
extends Node
    This class represents a node that don't used a ble connection for extract the data but generate fake data.

    The feature exported by this node must implement the interface NodeEmulator.EmulableFeature.

    The class will generate a new feature value each 1000ms

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  NodeEmulator.EmulableFeature
      Interface that the emulated feature have to implement

      • NodeEmulator

        public NodeEmulator(java.lang.Class<? extends Feature>[] emulFeature)

        emulFeature - list of feature that this node will emulate. The class must extend feature and implement NodeEmulator.EmulableFeature
        Throws:
        InvalidBleAdvertiseFormat - this eception is not throw since the advertise is a fake one
